bibl.title: P45 and the Textual History of the Gospel of Mark.

series.title: Journal for the Study of the New Testament. Supplement Series.

bibl.title: The Earliest Gospels. The Origins and Transmission of the Earliest Christian Gospels. - The Contribution of the Chester Beatty Gospel Codex P45
bibl.author: HURTADO, Larry W.

bibl.note: P. Chester Beatty I (= van Haelst 371). - Introductory Matters. - The Initial Impact. - P45 and the Caesarean Text-Type. - The Methodological Problem. - The Methodological Breakthrough and the Results for P45. - Conclusion.
HURTADO Larry W., P45 and the Textual History of the Gospel of Mark.

Charles HORTON (Ed.), The Earliest Gospels. The Origins and Transmission of the Earliest Christian Gospels. - The Contribution of the Chester Beatty Gospel Codex P45 = Journal for the Study of the New Testament. Supplement Series. 258 (London - New York, 2004) pp. 132-148.
